name: ArchenKnight
description:
This game is for the United Game Jam.

I am a  beginner and the fonts I used are on DaFonts.com

But all assets and arts were created by me.

You can play co-op or PVP  with the two souls character, a Knight and an Archer.

With your power you can use X to charge and release a Powerful Shot!

By the way, I am twelve years old and I got all these thru Youtube because I really wanted to be professional programmer someday.
